title: Sneak Peek: Season 4 of A Slight Change of Plans!
itunes:title: Sneak Peek: Season 4 of A Slight Change of Plans!
description:
A Slight Change of Plans returns next week with guests who will help us think differently about change so we can live happier, more fulfilling lives. Here's a sneak peek of the upcoming season!

You can follow the show at @DrMayaShankar on Instagram.

If you’d like to keep up with the most recent news from this and other Pushkin podcasts be sure to sign up for our email list at Pushkin.fm.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
